Benchmark.title: Linux No SUID on NFS Filesystems XCCDF
Benchmark.description: This document defines a small set of rules used to verify that the nosuid flag is set on nfs filesystems.
Benchmark.notice: This would be a sample Terms of Use

Group.title: NFS FileSystems Have Nosuid Flag
Group.description: Requirements relating to NFS filesystems being mounted with the nosuid flag.

Rule.title: /proc/mounts NFS Filesystems Have Nosuid
Rule.description: All NFS filesystems defined within /proc/mounts must have the nosuid flag.
Rule.fixtext: Verify that all nfs filesystems within /proc/mounts have the nosuid flag.

Rule.title: /etc/fstab NFS Filesystems Have Nosuid
Rule.description: All NFS filesystems defined within /etc/fstab must have the nosuid flag.
Rule.fixtext: Verify that all nfs filesystems within /etc/fstab have the nosuid flag.
